thread.title: Jason Priestley on Having Sex With Tori Spelling: 'It's Nobody's Business'
thread.title_full: Jason Priestley on Having Sex With Tori Spelling: 'It's Nobody's Business'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Jason Priestley on Having Sex With Tori Spelling: 'It's Nobody's Business'
text:
Comments 'I'm not getting into this... It's nobody's business... Either way...' Priestley tweeted in response to a fan's question if he hooked up with Spelling. 
Jason Priestley has responded to the much talked and headline making claim made by Tori Spelling that they hooked up during their years on hit TV show "Beverly Hills, 90210". The actor was asked by his Twitter follower whether Spelling's confession was true. He then responded by tweeting, "I'm not getting into this... It's nobody's business... Either way..." Spelling admitted in a lie detector test during Lifetime's one-hour special, "Celebrity Lie Detector", that she slept with Priestley. "It was a summer fling. It was off-set," she confessed. "It was our version of a summer romance. The 90210 version. And that was it, and we stayed great friends," she continued, adding, "Oh my god, I'm gonna get in so much trouble for this." I'm not getting into this... It's nobody's business... Either way... https://t.co/zBUX3Ept6s — Jason Priestley (@Jason_Priestley) October 5, 2015 Since then, Priestley received tons of tweets from fans who asked him about Spelling's confession. Not watching the made-for-TV film, titled " The Unauthorized Beverly Hills, 90210 Story ", Priestley wrote on Twitter that he was "hating on it." "I'm only speaking with negativity about the Lifetime movie and Tori's lie detector... Nothing but love for 90210," read one of his tweets. I'm only speaking with negativity about the Lifetime movie and Tori's lie detector... Nothing but love for 90210 https://t.co/wTAMIqNiBm — Jason Priestley (@Jason_Priestley) October 5, 2015
